1 import rospy
2 import rosnode
3 from threading import Thread
4 
5 from niryo_robot_msgs.srv import Ping, PingResponse
6 from std_msgs.msg import Bool
7 
8 
9 class RobotNodesObserver(object):
10 
11  def __init__(self, robot_status_handler):
12  """
13 
14  :type robot_status_handler: RobotStatusHandler
15  """
16  self.__robot_status_handler = robot_status_handler
17 
18  self.__log_nodes = rospy.get_param('~node_logs')
19  self.__initialization_params = rospy.get_param('~initialisation_params')
20 
21  self.__vital_nodes = rospy.get_param('~vital_nodes_common')
22  if rospy.has_param('/niryo_robot/simulation_mode') and not rospy.get_param('/niryo_robot/simulation_mode'):
23  self.__vital_nodes += rospy.get_param('~vital_nodes_real')
24 
25  self.__are_vital_nodes_alive = False
26  self.__missing_vital_nodes = []
27  self.__not_initialized_nodes = []
28  self.__check_nodes_timer = None
29 
30  self.__python_wrapper_nodes = set()
31  self.__advertise_python_ros_wrapper = rospy.Service('~ping_ros_wrapper',
32  Ping,
33  self.__callback_python_ros_wrapper_node)
34 
35  self.__handle_pyniryo_connection_loop = Thread(target=self.check_pyniryo_connection_loop)
36  self.pyniryo_connected = False
37  self.__pyniryo_node_ping_time = rospy.Time(0)
38  self.__pyniryo_nodes_sub = rospy.Subscriber('/ping_pyniryo', Bool, self.__callback_pyniryo_nodes)
39 
40  def __callback_python_ros_wrapper_node(self, req):
41  if req.name not in ['/niryo_robot_user_interface', '/system_software_node', '/niryo_robot_modbus', '']:
42  if req.state:
43  self.__python_wrapper_nodes.add(req.name)
44  elif req.name in self.__python_wrapper_nodes:
45  self.__python_wrapper_nodes.remove(req.name)
46  self.__robot_status_handler.advertise_new_state()
47  return PingResponse()
48 
49  def __callback_pyniryo_nodes(self, _msg):
50  self.__pyniryo_node_ping_time = rospy.Time.now()
51  if not self.pyniryo_connected:
52  self.pyniryo_connected = True
53  self.__robot_status_handler.advertise_new_state()
54  self.__handle_pyniryo_connection_loop = Thread(target=self.check_pyniryo_connection_loop)
55  self.__handle_pyniryo_connection_loop.start()
56 
57  def check_pyniryo_connection_loop(self):
58  loop_rate = rospy.Rate(2)
59  while not rospy.is_shutdown() and self.pyniryo_connected:
60  loop_rate.sleep()
61  self.pyniryo_connected = (rospy.Time.now() - self.__pyniryo_node_ping_time).to_sec() < 0.5
62  self.__robot_status_handler.advertise_new_state()
63 
64  def __get_alive_nodes(self):
65  try:
66  alive_nodes = rosnode.get_node_names()
67  except rosnode.ROSNodeIOException:
68  alive_nodes = []
69  return alive_nodes
70 
71  @property
72  def check_user_node(self):
73  alive_nodes = self.__get_alive_nodes()
74 
75  # remove dead nodes
76  self.__python_wrapper_nodes = {
77  pywrapper_node
78  for pywrapper_node in self.__python_wrapper_nodes
79  if pywrapper_node in alive_nodes and rosnode.rosnode_ping(pywrapper_node, 1)
80  }
81 
82  return bool(self.__python_wrapper_nodes)
83 
84  def check_vital_nodes(self):
85  alive_nodes = self.__get_alive_nodes()
86 
87  self.__python_wrapper_nodes = {
88  pywrapper_node
89  for pywrapper_node in self.__python_wrapper_nodes if pywrapper_node in alive_nodes
90  }
91 
92  missing_nodes = [
93  vital_node for vital_node in self.__vital_nodes
94  if vital_node not in alive_nodes or not rosnode.rosnode_ping(vital_node, 1)
95  ]
96 
97  self.__are_vital_nodes_alive = not bool(missing_nodes)
98  self.__missing_vital_nodes = missing_nodes
99 
100  return self.__are_vital_nodes_alive
101 
102  def check_nodes_initialization(self):
103  if not self.check_vital_nodes():
104  return False
105 
106  missing_params = []
107  for initialisation_param in self.__initialization_params:
108  if not rospy.has_param(initialisation_param) or not rospy.get_param(initialisation_param):
109  missing_params.append(initialisation_param)
110 
111  self.__not_initialized_nodes = missing_params
112  return not self.__not_initialized_nodes
113 
114  def start_nodes_check_loop(self):
115  if self.__check_nodes_timer is None:
116  self.__check_nodes_timer = rospy.Timer(rospy.Duration(1.0 / rospy.get_param('~check_nodes_frequency')),
117  self.__check_vital_nodes_callback)
118 
119  def __check_vital_nodes_callback(self, _):
120  self.check_vital_nodes()
121 
122  if not self.__are_vital_nodes_alive:
123  self.__robot_status_handler.advertise_new_state()
124 
125  @property
126  def are_vital_nodes_alive(self):
127  return self.__are_vital_nodes_alive
128 
129  @property
130  def missing_vital_nodes(self):
131  return self.__missing_vital_nodes
132

134  def not_initialized_nodes(self):
135  return self.__not_initialized_nodes
